context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.3.8 verified. Key features: (1) MOBILE FIX: Three 'Tester' buttons now use flex-wrap + flex-shrink-0 + min-w-0 pattern to prevent overflow on mobile - CampaignManager.js lines 582-610 (email), 677-703 (whatsapp), 893-910 (AI). (2) DEFAULT FAVICON: Afroboost default icon at https://i.ibb.co/4Z7q3Tvw/file-000000005c1471f4bc77c9174753b16b.png used if no faviconUrl/logoUrl configured - App.js lines 2828-2842. (3) AI PROMPT AUTO-SAVE: Both systemPrompt (Personnalité) and campaignPrompt (Priorité) auto-saved via PUT /api/ai-config with 1s debounce - CoachDashboard.js lines 714-752. (4) SAVE INDICATOR: aiConfigSaveStatus shown in Agent IA panel header - CampaignManager.js lines 726-739.

DEFAULT_FAVICON.splash_screen: VERIFIED - DEFAULT_LOGO used as fallback at App.js line 523
DEFAULT_FAVICON.page_favicon: VERIFIED - DEFAULT_FAVICON_URL chain at App.js lines 2829-2840

AI_CONFIG_AUTO_SAVE.debounce_implementation: VERIFIED - 1 second debounce at CoachDashboard.js lines 714-752
